metadata.synopsis: Laezel tells the player to place the Artefact in the Planecaster. She is more demanding and makes it clear that she will fight them if they don't do it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically after the CRE_ChainOfCommand_Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM if the player accepted Vlaaktih's orders or refused and Laezel wasn't convinced.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Your chance has come. Place the artefact - or know my rage.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Place the artefact. Or do not, and feel my bite.
